title.narrative: Procurement of Services for Chars Livelihoods Programme 2

description.narrative: This activity (Procurement of Services for Chars Livelihoods Programme 2) is a component of Chars Livelihoods Programme 2 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £11,327,422. This component benefits Bangladesh, and works in the following sector(s): Decentralisation and support to subnational government, Social Protection, Rural development. , with the following implementing partners: Maxwell Stamp PLC. The start date is 01-09-2009 and the end date is 30-06-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Decentralisation and support to subnational government
